channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Smart Sound Technology
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Smart Sound Technology

item.title: CVE-2018-3666|2024-08-05T04:50:30.427Z -- intel%20corporation -- smart%20sound%20technology
item.description: Driver module in Intel Smart Sound Technology before version 9.21.00.3541 potentially allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code as administrator via a non-paged pool overflow.

item.title: CVE-2018-3672|2024-08-05T04:50:30.418Z -- intel%20corporation -- smart%20sound%20technology
item.description: Driver module in Intel Smart Sound Technology before version 9.21.00.3541 potentially allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code as administrator via a system calls.

item.title: CVE-2018-3670|2024-08-05T04:50:30.347Z -- intel%20corporation -- smart%20sound%20technology
item.description: Driver module in Intel Smart Sound Technology before version 9.21.00.3541 potentially allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code as administrator via a buffer overflow.
